data.name: ArcheAge - Revelation Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get your first taste of what ArcheAge's newest expansion has to offer! Whether you're continuing your adventures on a favorite character or you're looking to start a brand new Dwarf or Warborn, these new boosts and familiar bonuses are sure to help you on your way!

30 Days Of Patron Status
Grants 20% more EXP, work 20% faster, own land, and more!

Bound Tax Certificates (x50)
Use to Pay Taxes on land

Bound Vocation Expertise tonics (x5)
Decrease production time and increase Vocation Badge gain for one hour

Bound XP Boost Potions (x5)
Increase XP Gain For One Hour

Bound Vocation tonics (x2)
Increase XP Gained From Labor Use For One Hour

Bound Imperial Jade Wings
Take to the Skies On This Jade-winged Glider

data.short_description: Get your first taste of what ArcheAge's newest expansion has to offer! Whether you're continuing your adventures on a favorite character or you're looking to start a brand new Dwarf or Warborn, these new boosts and familiar bonuses are sure to help you on your way!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Win7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must have at least 1024MB video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
